Tie waist knot.sentence: The patient stands upright to prepare for the waist knot.
Tie waist knot.subject: The patient

Tie waist knot.sentence: The nurse gathers the necessary fabric or belt to create the waist knot.
Tie waist knot.subject: The nurse

Tie waist knot.sentence: The nurse positions the fabric or belt around the patient's waist.
Tie waist knot.subject: The nurse

Tie waist knot.sentence: The nurse crosses the ends of the fabric or belt securely.
Tie waist knot.subject: The nurse
Tie waist knot.object: the ends of the fabric or belt

Tie waist knot.sentence: The nurse ties the ends of the fabric or belt into a knot to secure it.
Tie waist knot.subject: The nurse
Tie waist knot.object: the ends of the fabric or belt into a knot
